Other Information.Threshold Pressure: Low pressure (gate-opening observed at substantially lower pressures than propane)
Other Information.Additional Info: Preferential adsorption over propane; maximum uptake of 58.6 cm³ g⁻¹ at 1 bar and 303 K.

Other Information.Threshold Pressure: High pressure (gate-opening observed at approximately five times higher pressure than propylene)
Other Information.Additional Info: Weak interaction with the framework; minimal co-adsorption after propylene-induced gate-opening.

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiments, gas adsorption isotherms, DFT calculations
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: C3H6/C3H8 selectivity: 513 (IAST), C3H6 productivity: up to 53.5 l kg⁻¹ at 99.5% purity

Other Information.Additional Info: Demonstrated recyclability over 50 cycles without loss of performance; retains separation capability under humid conditions (50% RH).
